column3: “WOW! love this!! happy ,giggly like the good old days!! #1 strain in my books!  PLEASE someone(dispensary)  in phx. get a hold of this!!! cant find any , WAH!!!!”

“As a woman with strong cycles I need a good indica that puts me down.. PMS, cramps, bloating, unable to sleep due to discomfort, bitchy-ness...  Been trying Zombie and it's something special. Can't wait to make edibles out of it so I can feel it more in my body.”

“What's that I smell? Lavender, you say...First thing I picked up was the linalool and the pinene. Flower is dark green with tricomes galore. I think Zombie OG has a terpene profile, and THC to CBD ratio that may benefit people looking to reduce pain and experience positive mood enhancement. Look for softer selections of this strain, and administer in small doses to assess tolerance. Heavy body feeling kicked in about...”

“Never go to work while smoking this.... my boss nearly fired me lol
Other than that best weed u can have really although now i prefer K- train”

“Zombie OG is a great nighttime strain that allows me to relax, slowdown and ultimately cradle me into a deep, refreshing sleep. Upon purchase the flowers exhibited delicious berry and fruit notes, but the longer it was kept in a glass jar, the smell took on a savory, butterscotch aroma.  Highly recommended strain!”

“Okay. So. You guys (Leafly) need to get the strain Zombie Stomp on here.  I'll just leave a review on this strain. Mat Lee and Mr. Doobee leave good reviews about it, if you can actually find information about it. Anywho, this supposedly indica leaning strain gives more of a head high when consumed in small amounts. It's a thinker and chatty type of high. Great conversations come with smoking this shit. When consumed...”

“if your looking for a sweet berry tasting knock you out for the night strain here it is- this is definitely  (imo) stronger than most Indica strains I have tried with a really clean high that drifts you to sleep- this will give u total relaxation with abheavy head buzz and a creeping effect on the body for a cerebral buzz that will slowly whisk you to a good night's sleep- don't reccomnd smoking this in the day unles...”

“Wow. This one is for those with a high tolerance. I hit one bowl of this through a bong, and I didn't feel anything at first. I was pretty disappointed. Then all of a sudden out of nowhere, BAM! I'm standing there with my eyes closed, trying to comprehend the huge rush that's hitting me. I guess that's why they call it Zombie OG! Like a Zombie bite that infects you with time. Amazing strong indica that is great for p...”

“if your looking for a sweet berry tasting knock you out for the night strain here it is- this is definitely  (imo) stronger than most Indica strains I have tried with a really clean high that drifts you to sleep- this will give u total relaxation with abheavy head buzz and a creeping effect on the body for a cerebral buzz that will slowly whisk you to a good night's sleep- don't reccomnd smoking this in the day unles...”

“As someone who deals with MS on a daily basis this would be my top choice for muscle spasms or spasticity type pain especially in the lower back and legs!  I believe what I got was called Zombie Kush, but this OG data fits the shoe to a tee!”

“If sleep and relaxing on the couch is something you'd wanna do after smoking weed, this is truly the one you're looking for. in fact its 8pm where i am right now and i took 2 hits of this at about 2pm and have only just woken up from it. The girl behind the counter did warn me but i thought id have the tolerance to shut this down, instead i woke up in a pool of drool. Night night strain for sure”
“Smoking some flower of this and the smoke is so smooth and hits right after I exhale. I feel really relaxed and calm. one problem I'm glued to my seat and I can't finish the bowl. love this strain”
“Beautiful but very strange high. Felt like I could do anything but just couldn't get up. Only use if your day is pretty much done cause you ain't going anywhere after.”
“Yo la fume. Soy de Argentina. Estoy en España y un amigo cultivo está genética. Muy muy relajante para fumar a la noche.”

“Did about a bowl thinking it'd be light than bam. Couch lock like I've never felt. Good for pain relief, anxiety and definitely insomnia. No paranoia but flipping the record that was playing may have been the hardest thing I've had to do in a long time. It's not out of this world (granted it produced so much kief that i haven't tried) but it leaves you with a nice stony blanket that just feels nice. Now the entire pi...”
“By far one of my favorite strains! Definitely something different! Super strong with a great, long high. Strongly Recommend for pain, insomnia, or migraines!!”

“Did about a bowl thinking it'd be light than bam. Couch lock like I've never felt. Good for pain relief, anxiety and definitely insomnia. No paranoia but flipping the record that was playing may have been the hardest thing I've had to do in a long time. It's not out of this world (granted it produced so much kief that i haven't tried) but it leaves you with a nice stony blanket that just feels nice. Now the entire pi...”

“rly good bedtime strain!!! knocks me out like none other. i was experimenting w some indica heavy hybrids for bedtime but this is by far the best in my (albeit limited) experience. very relaxing, calming and just put me to sleep so quick! !!”

“Good pain relief. Nice heady indica,smooth and tasty in the bong.  Don't be afraid of it,it's a nice easy couchlock. If you smoke mostly indicas,this is a nice OG that you will want to keep on hand.”
“1 of my TOP 3 INDICA strains, courtesy of 7 Leaf Col. in E.LA..  No but or ifs? ZOMBIE OG gets it done.. Ideal for downtime..”
“By far one of my favorite strains! Definitely something different! Super strong with a great, long high. Strongly Recommend for pain, insomnia, or migraines!!”

“zombie og is a nice even relaxing high that leaves you with a dry mouth. the buds where nice and light pink with a nice spicy kick to the taste sending the Palit into a amazement of spicy frut and berry flavors that amaze the mind and leave you laughing for hours on end”
“This has to be the strongest hitting indica iv tried. I usually only smoke concentrate but this is an exception!”
“Beautiful but very strange high. Felt like I could do anything but just couldn't get up. Only use if your day is pretty much done cause you ain't going anywhere after.”
“Smoking some flower of this and the smoke is so smooth and hits right after I exhale. I feel really relaxed and calm. one problem I'm glued to my seat and I can't finish the bowl. love this strain”
“Yo la fume. Soy de Argentina. Estoy en España y un amigo cultivo está genética. Muy muy relajante para fumar a la noche.”

“If sleep and relaxing on the couch is something you'd wanna do after smoking weed, this is truly the one you're looking for. in fact its 8pm where i am right now and i took 2 hits of this at about 2pm and have only just woken up from it. The girl behind the counter did warn me but i thought id have the tolerance to shut this down, instead i woke up in a pool of drool. Night night strain for sure”
“Leyendo este reportaje me pegó tol viaje.”
“One of my favs now, and one of the best looking buds I have seen immensely covered in trichomes with green/purple color and potent”

“Get something to drink or eat close to your sofa, after you try it you will feel very hungry but also too tired to get to the fridge. Reduced muscle fatige after training.
Bad thing, mouth gets too dry after some time.”
“Firs time ordering online, and I was sceptical, but this easily became one of my favourite strains.”

“It was trippy, at first it was light then it all fell on me like a truck
Heavy Head and Body high, it was great, I would get it again”

“So far, I really enjoy this strain. It's mellow, but not so mellow where I have couch lock, which is a good thing. I'm using it for edibles and I think it will be really good for pain relief, and it's mixed with agent orange, so hopefully the doses in the cannaoil will be not only potent, but long-lasting. Yes, this is a favorite 👍”
“An incredibly calming strain. I felt relaxed when smoking, and slept well afterwards.”
“Was some flames 🔥 heavy high great to smoke at night”

“Zombie OG is a godsend. If you smoke it correctly, it will give you a high similar to crack cocaine for a few seconds, but that is a poor shitty comparison but I can think of nothing else similar. It's like god giving you a hug. I don't neccesarily beleive in god(i've no idea)but if there was one and he could do that, then this is the strain or one of them. I have experienced similar traits but only from other source...”
“good smoke for the price, will put you right out”
“dank smells like catpiss and purple as all hell”
“This is some of the best stuff I've smoked, and I've smoked a lot!”
“Heavy. Knocks me right out”

“Two hits and I'm where I wanna be. Heavy Head & Body high. Super beneficial for my PTSD, awesome for a nighttime session or just in general. Dab challenges I recommend the crumble.
 (beware the cottonmouth)”
“Covered in trichs, super frosty and gassy.”
“Makes you super tired and stoned. Best for  when you wanna go to sleep”
“Sleepy aslll”

“Tried this in concentrate form.  It hit me right away.  Great body high.  Sat back and relaxed.  Will be saving it for night time dabbing.  Would recommend for people with pain.  Also, for my PTSD it works for getting me to sleep.  The initial body high lasted an hour or so for me.”

“What a ride this strain was. Once administered, I found it to treat my anxiety but make me super talkative. Very ephuroic. Interestly enough, more available in September than October. 4/5, a good fall treat every year but didn't find it to do much but treat anxiety in a different way than anything before.”
“Great strain for pain reduction and curing insomnia. it made me fall asleep fast and I was pain free all night before I went to bed. would not recommend for day use.”

“Well after staring at the screen all zombied out I'm starting to write.

When I bought this the name was Purple Zombie" I can't seem to find that strain so hoping this is the closest on Leafly.
no anxiety
column5: a little pasty eyes (need water!). Ahh!! 😀

column1: The smell of this bud is amazing. Smells so sweet you know there are good terpenes in there.

column3: “LOVE THIS STRAIN!! #1 IN MY BOOK!”
“I'm chilling. This strain is magic. It's New Years, but I think the bed is calling my name! Good night.”
“This was really amazing it's been awhile since I've felt so relaxed.  Thank you zombie og!”

“I don't know if it was the shops I got this from or what I bought this from 2 different shops and both times it was dry and full of stems... one was stickier than the other but still dry. burns super fast but the high is pretty good. doesn't last too long maybe about an hour and half.”

“I bought it because of the high ratings, and boy was I dissapointed. I had 3 BIG vapes, and got at best  moderate results. I saw the dospensary dropped the price from 8 odwn to to 5 the day after I got it. 

there were so few but such high ratings, it makes me wonder if someone was promoting it...”
“the best experience ever”

“Perfect for going to a club or going out to chill 
Top 10 favorite strains”
“Bout to dab from Lamota 69.8 % 😆😆😆”
“Not as good as expected. 3 big tokes got moderate results, not very good pain relief.”

“I'm not trying to brag, but I've been in the industry for a bit and know my way around a bud or two. 
                          
I was in a bad way and felt the pull of depression on my pantleg again, I had things under control for the moment, but knew it wouldn't last. When you've been me as long as I have,you learn to pick up on the signs. I knew that my only chance was to put faith in the only thing I've ever tr...”
“Over-rated for the chronic user.”
